jobDescription: Job title: Data AnalystDuration : 24 MonthsLocation : Oakbrook Terrace IL  Job Description Day-to-Day: reporting and data analytics; possible internal/external customer contacts; coordinating events  Meetings between the municipalities and the company - these roles would help coordinate the materials for these meetings  Customers can delay the installations of the Smart Meters and the people in these roles would reach out to these customers to explain the benefits of the new meters  Excel: Need to be able to use Excel for Pivot tables, graphing, charts, etc. Their charts and graphs will be used in formal presentations potentially up to the VP's  PowerPoint experience is important  Data/Analysis: pulling together data around how many appointments  they have made, how many meters have been refused, reasons for refusal, number of complaints, claims, service level reporting for the call center, etc. which is then reported to government bodies  Would consider recent graduates with strong Excel and PowerPoint  experience Customer contact would be required and if they have prior Customer Service experience that would be helpful (mostly over the phone). Typically the customers have spoken to the call center first and often times this group in initiating a return call to them Degree: Not requiredSkill ranking:
